name: BZZZZZ
description:
CONTENT WARNING: MAY TRIGGER TRYPOPHOBIA 

An authentic BEE LIFE SIMULATION made for Bitsy Jam Bees Apr/May 2019. Take to your wings as a honeybee tasked to COLLECT all the NECTAR and POLLEN in the world for the good of your HIVE and QUEEN and the wiggly larvae that will one day be a bee just like YOU!

Features:

  • 8 flowers to buzz around
  • 3 types of luscious nectars
  • 2 types of nutritious pollens
  • No way to lose
  • Bonus:  help your friend find a special treat
